mapper.insert: insert into shoplist (username, shopname, shopcontent, regdate, address) values( #{username}, #{shopname}, #{shopcontent}, sysdate, #{address} )

create table ${username}_PRODUCT ( productnum varchar2(50) primary key not null, productname varchar2(1000) not null, wishcount number default 0, totalprice number not null, productcount number not null, sellcount number default 0 not null, imagecount number default 0 not null, content CLOB, readcount number default 0 not null, startdate date default sysdate not null, enddate date, optionstatus number default 0 )
create table ${username}_images ( productnum varchar2(50) not null, filename varchar2(4000) not null )

insert into ${username}_PRODUCT (productnum, productname, totalprice, productcount, imagecount, content, startdate, enddate, optionstatus) values( TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY') || #{productnum} || LPAD(${seqnum}_seq.nextval, 5, '0')), #{productname}, #{totalprice}, #{productcount}, #{imagecount}, #{content}, sysdate, #{enddate}, #{optionstatus} )

insert into ${username}_PRODUCT (productnum, productname, totalprice, productcount) values( TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY') || #{productnum} || LPAD(${seqnum}_seq.nextval, 5, '0')), #{productname}, #{totalprice}, #{productcount} )
mapper.select: select productnum from (select c.* , rownum r from (select productnum from ${username}_product order by startdate desc) c) where r = 1
mapper.insert: insert into ALLPRODUCT (productnum, productname, cate1, cate2, cate3, area1, area2, username) values ( #{productnum}, #{productname}, #{cate1}, #{cate2}, #{cate3}, #{area1}, #{area2}, #{username} )
create table ${productnum}_reviews ( username varchar2(50), productnum varchar2(50), content varchar2(4000), imagecount number default 0, stars number default 5, regdate date default sysdate )
